Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Colorado in 2020...
Traded from Colorado to San Francisco on 3/2/2020 (Going to SF: P Adrian Bengoa. Going to COL: LF Manuel Hernandez)...
Injured on 8/16/2021 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/4/2022 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 7/23/2023...
